Uses of Class
task.Task

  • Packages that use Task 
    Package Description
    command  
    parser  
    storage  
    task  
    taskList  
    ui  

    • Uses of Task in command

      Constructors in command with parameters of type Task 
      Constructor Description
      AddCommand​(Task taskToAdd)
      Constructs a new `AddCommand` instance with the specified task to be added.
      ToDoCommand​(Task taskToDo)
      Constructs a new `ToDoCommand` instance with the specified `Task` to be added as a "ToDo" task.

    • Uses of Task in parser

      Methods in parser that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Task Parser.parseTask​(java.lang.String taskData)
      Parses a string containing task data and creates the corresponding `Task` object.

    • Uses of Task in storage

      Method parameters in storage with type arguments of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Storage.saveTask​(java.util.ArrayList<Task> tasks)
      Saves the provided list of tasks to the task data file.

    • Uses of Task in task

      Subclasses of Task in task 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Add
      The `Add` class represents an "add" task in the BloopBot application.
      class  DeadLine
      The `DeadLine` class represents a deadline task in the BloopBot application.
      class  Event
      The `Event` class represents an event task in the BloopBot application.
      class  ToDo
      The `ToDo` class represents a task without a specific deadline or event time in the BloopBot application.

    • Uses of Task in taskList

      Methods in taskList that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Task TaskList.deleteTask​(int taskNum)
      Deletes a task from the task list.
      Methods in taskList that return types with arguments of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Task> TaskList.getTasks()
      Retrieves the list of tasks.
      Methods in taskList with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void TaskList.addTask​(Task taskDesc)
      Adds a task to the task list.

    • Uses of Task in ui

      Methods in ui with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Ui.showDeletedTask​(Task task, int totalTasks)
      Displays a message to confirm the deletion of a task.
      void Ui.showTaskAdded​(Task task, int totalTasks)
      Displays a message to confirm the addition of a task.
      void Ui.showTaskMarked​(Task taskToUnmark)
      Displays a message to indicate that a task has been marked as done.
      void Ui.showTaskUnmarked​(Task taskToUnmark)
      Displays a message to indicate that a task has been unmarked as done.
